info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 17 at 6:10PM EDT until September 17 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of central and west central Florida, including the following counties, in central Florida, Polk. In west central Florida, Hillsborough.
* WHEN...Until 815 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Winter Haven, Bartow, Lake Wales, Fort Meade, Mulberry, Dundee, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Bradley Junction, Homeland, Bartow Municipal Airport, Alturas, Alafia River State Park, Wahneta, Fort Lonesome, Cypress Gardens and Waverly. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT THIS EVENING
